Uses of Class
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app.SmartCommands.GuardedCommand

Packages that use SmartCommands.GuardedCommand
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app Contains all the Activity basis classes, an Android Application class, and some classes useful to activities. 
 

Uses of SmartCommands.GuardedCommand in com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app
 

Subclasses of SmartCommands.GuardedCommand in com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app
static class SmartCommands.AbstractSimpleGuardedCommand<ContextClass extends Context>
          A handy SmartCommands.GuardedCommand which will issue systematically a log when an exception occurs during the command execution, and will trigger a SmartCommands.GuardedException which wraps the original exception in that case.
static class SmartCommands.DialogGuardedCommand
          A handy SmartCommands.SimpleGuardedCommand which will issue systematically dismiss a Dialog once the command execution is over.
static class SmartCommands.GuardedDialogInterfaceClickListener
          A DialogInterface.OnClickListener which runs its execution in the low-priority threads pool, and which handles exceptions.
static class SmartCommands.GuardedViewClickListener
          A View.OnClickListener which runs its execution in the low-priority threads pool, and which handles exceptions.
static class SmartCommands.ProgressGuardedCommand
          Enables to execute in background a task, by notifying when the execution is running.
static class SmartCommands.SimpleGuardedCommand
          A handy SmartCommands.AbstractSimpleGuardedCommand dedicated to activities.
 

Methods in com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app that return SmartCommands.GuardedCommand
 SmartCommands.GuardedCommand<ContextClass> SmartCommands.GuardedCommand.setDelegate(SmartCommands.GuardedHandler delegate)
          Sets the delegate that will be used in case of exception thrown during the command execution.
 

Methods in com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app with parameters of type SmartCommands.GuardedCommand
static void SmartCommands.execute(SmartCommands.GuardedCommand<?> guardedCommand)
          Simply executes the provided command via the SmartCommands.LOW_PRIORITY_THREAD_POOL, which enables to run a command, and take benefit from the ActivityController.ExceptionHandler if the command triggers an exception.
 void SmartCommands.SmartThreadPoolExecutor.execute(SmartCommands.GuardedCommand<?> guardedCommand)
          Executes the given command.
 java.util.concurrent.Future<?> SmartCommands.SmartThreadPoolExecutor.submit(SmartCommands.GuardedCommand<?> guardedCommand)
          Executes the given command.
